spells.description: Several targets become fatigued.

spells.name: Weaken Powder

spells.name: Weapon of Awe
spells.description: Weapon gets +2 on damage rolls.

spells.name: Weapons Against Evil
spells.description: Enhance weapons with pale light that allow them to bypass minor DR of evil creatures.

spells.name: Weaponwand
spells.description: Merge a wand with your weapon, allowing you to wield the wand at the same time you use your weapon.

spells.name: Web
spells.description: Fills 20-ft.-radius spread with sticky spiderwebs that can grapple foes and impair movement.

spells.name: Web Bolt
spells.description: Throw a fist-sized ball of webbing at a target to ensare them.

spells.name: Web Cloud
spells.description: Create a cloud-like spread of flame-resistant webbing.

spells.name: Web Shelter
spells.description: Create a comfortable shelter made of webbing.

spells.name: Weird
spells.description: As phantasmal killer, but affects all within 30 ft.

spells.name: What Grows Within
spells.description: Infect others with Xhamen-Dor’s seeded infestation.

spells.name: Whip of Ants
spells.description: Create a whip made of army ants.

spells.name: Whip of Centipedes
spells.description: Create a whip made of poisonous centipedes.

spells.name: Whip of Spiders
spells.description: Create a whip made of poisonous spiders.

spells.name: Whirlwind
spells.description: Cyclone deals damage and can pick up creatures.

spells.name: Whispering Lore
spells.description: Gain a bonus to Knowledge based on the terrain you are in.

spells.name: Whispering Wind
spells.description: Sends a short message 1 mile/level.

spells.name: Wicker Horse
spells.description: Create a mount out of the surrounding flora

spells.name: Widen Auras
spells.description: Increase the range of auras bestowed by your class.

spells.name: Wild Instinct
spells.description: Sharpen your senses, gain a bonus to Perception even while asleep.

spells.name: Wilderness Soldiers
spells.description: Nearby plants aid you in combat.

spells.name: Wind Blades
spells.description: Harden the air around the target into jagged invisible blades.

spells.name: Wind Walk
spells.description: You and your allies turn vaporous and travel fast.

spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.description: Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.

spells.name: Winds of Vengeance
spells.description: Gives you the ability to fly and attack with wind.

spells.name: Windy Escape
spells.description: Briefly become insubstantial, allowing an attack to pass harmlessly through you.

spells.name: Wing Bounty
spells.description: Sprout berries from your wings, enhanced as if by goodberry.

spells.name: Wing Thorns
spells.description: Sprout poisonous thorns from your wings.

spells.name: Winged Sword
spells.description: Grant a weapon the throwing special ability.

spells.name: Winter Feathers
spells.description: Protect a feathered creature from the cold for a day.

spells.name: Winter Grasp
spells.description: Create a slippery sheet of ice on the ground

spells.name: WishM
spells.description: As limited wish, but with fewer limits.

spells.name: With the Wind
spells.description: Protect a target from being blown away by wind of less than windstorm force

spells.name: Withdraw Affliction
spells.description: Remove an affliction and inflict it on another creature.

spells.name: Wither Limb
spells.description: Make one of the creature's limbs useless.

spells.name: Witness
spells.description: See through the target's eyes and ears.

spells.name: Wizened Appearance
spells.description: Make a target appear as an older version of itself.

spells.name: Wood Shape
spells.description: Reshapes wooden objects to suit you.

spells.name: Wooden Phalanx
spells.description: Creates 1d4+2 temporary wood golems to fight for you.

spells.name: Wooden Wing Shield
spells.description: Transmute your wings into a wooden shield-like barrier.

spells.name: Word of Chaos
spells.description: Kills, confuses, stuns, or deafens nonchaotic subjects.

spells.name: Word of Recall
spells.description: Teleports you back to designated place.

spells.name: Word of Resolve
spells.description: Ally rerolls a save against charm or fear.

spells.name: World Wave
spells.description: Earth moves you across distances.

spells.name: Wracking Ray
spells.description: Fire a ray to deal Dexterity and Strength damage.

spells.name: Wrath
spells.description: +1 attack and damage against target creature.

spells.name: Wrathful Mantle
spells.description: Subject shines and gets +1/four levels on all saves.

spells.name: Wrathful Weapon
spells.description: Enhance a weapon with the anarchic, axiomatic, holy, or unholy special ability.

spells.name: Wreath of Blades

spells.name: Yellow SignM
spells.description: Use this symbol to subject all who view it to the will of Hastur.

spells.name: Youthful Appearance
spells.description: Target appears younger.

spells.name: Zephyr's Fleetness
spells.description: +30 foot land and fly speed (if any) to your allies.

spells.name: Zone of Foul Flames
spells.description: Create an area that returns fire spells and effects back onto their caster.

spells.name: Zone of Silence

spells.name: Zone of Truth
